name: Morning Glory
description: The sun is shining, rise up champ—today’s all yours!

name: No Doubts
description: Yes, absolutely—don’t even think twice about it.

name: Chill Yes
description: For sure bro, relax and go with the flow.

name: Big Promise
description: This one’s a guarantee—bet your sandwich on it.

name: Lucky Night
description: Tonight the stars align—things are looking good.

name: Hard No
description: Nope. Not happening. Don’t waste your energy.

name: Forget It
description: Forget it, dude. There are better things to do.

name: Hell No
description: Hell no! That’s a one-way ticket to regret.

name: Netflix Block
description: Not tonight, man—Netflix is way more important.

name: Eternal No
description: Never ever in a million years. Nope.

name: Unclear
description: Maybe… the universe is still buffering.

name: Later Maybe
description: Ask again later—right now the vibes are mixed.

name: Half Half
description: It’s fifty-fifty, flip a coin and see.

name: Coin Toss
description: Could go either way—just like a coin in the air.

name: Random Noon
description: Afternoons are unpredictable—you’ll see what happens.

name: Stoner Mood
description: Bro, I’m way too high for this question.

name: Snack Time
description: The answer is simple: go grab a sandwich.

name: Cat Oracle
description: Ask your cat—he knows more than me.

name: Potato Truth
description: The universe whispers… potato.

name: GOOOOY!
description: GOOOOY! The only answer you’ll ever need.
